abstract: British prosecutors label suspect in attack in London subway station, which critically injured 56-year-old man, terrorist; Prime Min David Cameron lauds bystanders' comment, 'You ain't no Muslim,' captured on video.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister David Cameron praised the reaction of a witness to the stabbing at a subway station, whose words have been cited as a rallying call for unity and a rejection of violence.

headline.main: Cameron Praises ‘You Ain’t No Muslim, Bruv’ Remark in London Attack

snippet: Prime Minister David Cameron praised the reaction of a witness to the stabbing at a subway station, whose words have been cited as a rallying call for unity and a rejection of violence.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
